hero.subtitle: Where Canberra meets the rich flavors of the archipelago
hero.title: Discover Authentic Indonesian Coffee

blocks.content: Experience singles origins, unique blends, and in-house roasting processes.
Explore our distinctive menu showcasing Indonesian coffees and homemade treats.
Learn about Monkey Bean's journey and commitment to quality sourced directly from Indonesian farms.
